name: mikoide
author: MikoIDE Team
description: A modern, cross-platform Integrated Development Environment (IDE) built with cutting-edge web technologies and native performance.

scripts.dev:win: concurrently "vite" "cmake -S . -B build -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && cmake --build build --config Debug && build/Debug/MikoIDE.exe"
scripts.build:release:win: bun run build:frontend && bun run script/setupshell/genbinary.ts && bun run script/build.ts && bun run build:cli:win && bun run script/postprocessing/buildinstall.ts
scripts.build:release:linux: bun run build:frontend && bun run ./script/make.ts build
